structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth
Interstate Compact On Educational Opportunity For Military Children

law.text: [ Text of section added by 2012, 108, Sec. 6 effective May 31, 2012.] (a) This compact shall be severable and if any phrase, clause, sentence or provision is deemed unenforceable, the remaining provisions of the compact shall be enforceable. (b) This compact shall be liberally construed to effectuate its purposes. (c) Nothing in this compact shall be construed to prohibit the applicability of other interstate compacts to which the states are members.
